Multiple Brands Under One Amazon Account
s: Hi there, I would greatly appreciate your help. We own two Amazon brands under separate accounts, each with its own business information. We want to launch a new brand through Brand Registry using one of these accounts, essentially managing multiple brand stores under one account.

t: Can I have two brand stores each in one account?
s: Yes, you can have 2 brand stores in one Selling Account. In fact, this is the requirement if you have multiple brands. Currently, you can only have 1 store per brand. For more info, including some FAQ's at the bottom of the page, please check out the Stores page on the Amazon Ads website.
